author: epugh
msg: Added ability to pass to ant cactus task a tmpDir for Tomcat 4.x and 5.x.  Allows you
to put the cactus tomcat container anywhere you want.  Defaults to the system

author: evenisse
msg: Fixed MAVEN-452. Patch for charter encoding. Thanks to Kuisong Tong.
I think that this must be apply to all uses of doc:jsl tag.

author: epugh
msg: Updated plugin to use latest torque generator.  Also requires commons logging.
This seems to fix the various problems compiling OM objects in Turbine.

author: evenisse
msg: Fixed for MAVEN-518 (artifacts are used for path, not dependencies).

author: michal
msg: Added install, install-snapshot, deploy, deploy-snapshot goals
